description:
Zoro, Sanji, Nami, and Chopper try to catch up with their captain, Soge King is nowhere to be found, and Luffy runs head first into a battle with Blueno!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Robin Betrayed! The Motive of the World Government!
Robin est trahie ! Les espérance du gouvernement mondial
Uragirareta Robin! Sekai Seifu no Omowaku!
¡Robin ha sido traicionada! ¡Las expectativas del Gobierno Mundial!
裏切られたロビン! 世界政府の思惑!
